"Nine pence."
“9便士，前两天不是要11便士吗？”周明瑞下意识问道。
"Nine pence? Wasn't it eleven pence two days ago?" Zhou Mingrui asked subconsciously.
“……不。”真正的占卜师回答道。
"…No," the real fortune-teller answered.
“……用左轮抵住太阳穴开了一枪？”前后线索霍然贯通，周明瑞大概明白克莱恩的死因了。
"Releasing a round with a revolver pointed at the temple?" After mixing and matching the clues from before, Zhou Mingrui had a rough idea how Klein had died.
“一个尝试。”
"An attempt."
“不。”周明瑞摇头回答，他哪有闲钱去占卜。
"No." Zhou Mingrui shook his head in response. He did not have the spare cash for divination.
“不会磕破头了吧？”周明瑞边猜想边转过身体，走向那面有裂纹的穿衣镜。

Did I smash my head open?
Zhou Mingrui guessed as he turned around and walked towards a cracked dressing mirror.
“不作死就不会死……”
"If you didn't seek death, you wouldn't die…"
“不好意思，忘了问，你要占卜什么？”
"I'm sorry, I forgot to ask, but what would you like to ask about?"
“不要介意，我只是喜欢这个，不得不说，有的时候，我的占卜和解读都挺准，真的……”
"Don't mind this, it's just that I like doing this. But I have to say, my divination and interpretation can be really accurate sometimes. I'm serious..."
“不，我一直都是这么年轻。”温蒂幽默回答。
"No, I have always been this young," answered Wendy humorously.
“两天后，要参加廷根大学历史系的面试……”
He needs to participate in the Tingen University's History department interview two days later…
“他真是个勤奋的好小伙，会有个好妻子的。”
"He sure is a hardworking lad. He will have a good wife."
“以克莱恩的家境，哪有钱和渠道买手枪？”周明瑞不由皱起了眉头。

With Klein's family situation, how can they have the money or means to buy a revolver?
Zhou Mingrui could not help but frown.
“会不会误击发？”
Would I end up misfiring?
“你怎么又在假扮我！给人占卜是我的工作！”一道女声愤怒低吼，“快回去！你要记住，你只是一个驯兽师！”

"Why are you impersonating me again! It's my job to handle the divination for people!" a woman's voice growled angrily. "Return to your post quickly! You must remember that you're just an animal trainer!"
“你是鲁恩人吧？”
"Are you a Ruen?"
“你来洗牌、切牌。”这位马戏团的占卜师低哑说道。
"Shuffle the cards first and cut the deck," the circus fortune-teller said in a muted voice.
“你要感谢《谷物法案》的废除，感谢那些游行的人。”温蒂双手摊开笑道。
"You have to thank the people who protested on the streets for the repeal of the Grain Act," said Wendy as she shrugged.
“倒霉……对了，我今天晚上吃饭前做了个转运仪式！”
Bad luck… Yes, I tried a luck enhancement ritual before dinner today!
“先生，你是今天第一位来占卜的人，免费。”
"Sir, you are the first one here today, so it's on the house."
“先生，你说的我都知道，甚至知道更多，比如值夜者，比如代罚者，比如机械之心，但是，我不想失去自由。”
"Sir, I knew all what you had said, I even knew more, including the nighthawks, scapegoats and robotic minds, but I don't want to lose my freedom.
“先看‘现在’吧。”周明瑞略作思考道。
"I'll have a look at the 'present' first," Zhou Mingrui said after giving it some thought.
“克莱恩，你把剩下的面包都拿出来，今天记得买新的，还有肉和豌豆，你快参加面试了，我给你做豌豆炖羔羊肉。”
"Klein, take out all the remaining bread. Remember to buy fresh ones today. There's meat and peas too. Quickly go for your interview. I'll make you mutton stewed with peas."
“克莱恩，羔羊肉和豌豆不要买多了，班森或许得周日才能回来，嗯，记得面包只要八磅。”
"Klein, don't buy too much mutton or peas. Benson might come back on Sunday. Oh, remember we only need eight pounds of bread."
“免费吗？”
"Is it free?"
“免费的。”
"It's free."
“关爱智障哥哥的眼神？”
Is it a look of love and concern for a retarded brother?
“又热又鲜的牡蛎汤，早上喝一碗，精神一整天！”
"Hot and fresh oyster soup. Drink a bowl in the morning and feel invigorated all day!"
“发生了什么？”梅丽莎听到动静，疑惑地望了过来。
"What happened?" Melissa looked over curiously when she heard the commotion.
“哦，小克莱恩，班森呢，还没回来？”温蒂笑眯眯问道。
"Oh, Little Klein, where's Benson? Is he not back?" Wendy asked smilingly.
“哪有不想付出代价就成为非凡者的？如果不考虑加入教会，接受考验，那你只能去找王室，找家族历史在千年以上的那几位贵族，或者，凭运气寻觅那些躲躲藏藏的邪恶组织。”

"You can't become an extraordinaire without any sacrifices. If you don't consider joining churches and accepting the given challenges, you can only go to find royal families and the few nobles with family histories of more than a thousand years, or rely on your luck to search for the clandestine evil organisations."
“嗯……”收回手，按住左侧太阳穴，周明瑞榨取起记忆碎片，寻找事情缘由。
"Hmm…" Retracting his hand and pressing on his left temple, Zhou Mingrui sought for the reason by rummaging through his memory fragments.
“嗯，这段时间和以往没太大差别啊，就是倒霉了一点，怎么会莫名其妙就穿越了？”
Yea, there has not been much difference for me between this period of time and the past. I was just a little unlucky, but why would I transmigrate for no baffling reason?
“城外农庄刚采集的蔬菜，又便宜又新鲜！”
"Vegetables freshly plucked from the farms outside the city. Cheap and fresh!"
“塔罗……”周明瑞顿时愣住。
"Tarot…" Zhou Mingrui was instantly dumbfounded.
“她刚才的表情怎么有种嫌弃又无奈的味道。”
Why did her expression have a look of disparagement and resignation?
“好了。”他将洗好的塔罗牌放在了桌子中央。
"It's done." He placed the already shuffled tarot cards in the middle of the table.
“好了。”她简短不带一点情绪地说道，然后按回顶端，将怀表还给了周明瑞。
"It's okay now," she said simply without emotion. She then pressed the top button back and handed the pocket watch back to Zhou Mingrui.
“好了，你想先看哪张牌？”做完这一切，占卜师抬起脑袋，用灰蓝色的眼眸深深望向周明瑞。
"Alright, which card would you like to see first?" The fortune-teller raised her head up after completing her placement of the cards and gazed deeply at Zhou Mingrui with her grayish-blue eyes.
“好像又坏了。”他没话找话说地看向妹妹。
"It looks like its broken again." He looked at his sister while trying to find a topic of conversation.
“好的。”
"Alright."
“好，好的。”周明瑞无奈回答。
"Alright. Sure thing," answered Zhou Mingrui exasperatedly.
“如果不，呃，价格合理，我试一试。”
"If the… well… price is reasonable, I'll give it a try."
“小松饼、鳗鱼汤配姜啤！”
"Muffins and eel soup make the perfect combination!"
“当然，如果你正式提出，我现在就能让你回去。”
"Of course, if you wish to. I can return you back now."
“当然，每个人的命运只有自己才能占卜，我只是一个解读者。”
"Of course, everyone's destiny can only be unraveled by themselves. I only serve as a reader of it."
“怎么回事？”他皱眉低语，打算再认真检查一遍头部的伤口。
"What's happening?" he muttered with a frown. He planned to inspect his head injury seriously once more.
“您想做什么？”
"What are you planning on doing?"
“想成为非凡者，就加入黑夜女神教会，风暴之主教会，或蒸汽与机械之神教会。”
"If you want to become an extraordinaire, join the churches of either Evernight Goddess, Lord of Storms or God of Steam and Machinery
“愚者。”占卜师轻声念出了这张牌，灰蓝眼眸定定看着周明瑞。
"The Fool," the fortune-teller lightly read out the name of the card with her grayish-blue eyes affixed on Zhou Mingrui.
“我不是去面试，只是买个菜，准备转运仪式的材料而已……”忽然，他低声嘟囔，摇头失笑。
"I'm not going for an interview. All I'm doing is to buy some ingredients to prepare for my luck enhancement ritual…" Suddenly, he muttered softly as he shook his head with a wry smile.
“我以霍尔家族之名，命令你苏醒！”
"In the name of the Hall family, I command you to awaken!"
“我手上其实有两份序列9的魔药配方。”
"I have two sets of potions of series nine."
“我来洗？”周明瑞下意识反问。
"Me? Shuffle?" Zhou Mingrui asked reflexively.
“我的塔罗占卜很准的。”
"My tarot divination is very accurate."
“所有人都会死，包括我。”
"Everyone will die, including me."
“斯林太太，8磅黑麦面包。”
"Mrs. Smyrin, 8 pounds of rye bread."
“斯林太太，您今天真像个年轻又活泼的女士。”周明瑞只能干笑回应。
"Mrs. Smyrin, you seem to be a young and energetic woman today." All Zhou Mingrui could do was respond with a dry smile.
“明天晚上，马戏团表演？”周明瑞瞄了眼别人手中的传单，低声念出了大概内容。
"There's a circus performance tomorrow night?" Zhou Mingrui glanced at the fliers in the hands of others as he read their content under his breath.
“有一定可能是那个转运仪式……嗯，明天在这里试一试，如果真是因为它，那我就有希望穿回去了！”周明瑞停下抖甩左轮手枪的动作，猛地坐直了身体。

"There is a distinct possibility that it's due to that luck enhancement ritual… Yes, I should give it a try here tomorrow. If it's really because of that, I stand a chance of transmigrating back!" Zhou Mingrui stopped flicking the revolver's cylinder and suddenly sat straight up.
“来来来，好吃的香煎肉鱼！”
"Come and try our delicious roasted fish!"
“果然……”周明瑞看了眼那空弹壳，一边将子弹挨个塞回转轮，一边微微点头。
"Indeed…" Zhou Mingrui looked at the empty cartridge shell in front of him and stuffed the rounds back into the cylinder while nodding.
“梅丽莎醒了……她还真是一如既往的准时啊。”周明瑞微微一笑，受克莱恩记忆的影响，对梅丽莎有种看自己亲妹妹的感觉。
"Melissa is awake… She's really as punctual as always." Zhou Mingrui smiled. Due to Klein's memories, seeing Melissa made him feel as though she was really his younger sister.
“没有了。”占卜师伸出手指，从顶端拿起一张牌，放在了周明瑞左手边，嗓音愈发地低哑，“这张象征过去。”

"No problem." The fortune-teller reached out her fingers and picked a card from the top of the deck. Then she placed it on the left side of Zhou Mingrui. Her voice was going lower and lower as she spoke, "This card symbolizes your past."
“没有别的办法了吗？”
"Are there no more ideas?"
“海螺，海螺，海螺！”
"Conch! Conch! Conch!"
“港口送来的新鲜鱼，只要5便士一条！”
"Fresh fish from the port for just five pence a piece!"
“爸爸果然在欺骗我，每次都给我讲这面镜子是古代所罗门帝国黑皇帝的珍宝，是非凡物品……”
"Father was indeed lying to me. He always tells me that this mirror was the treasure of the Roman Empire's Dark Emperor, and that it is an extraordinary item..."
“现在好了，你已经毕业了，我们的霍伊大学历史系毕业生~嗯，你很快就能赚到钱，你们不应该住现在这样的公寓，至少得有个属于自己的盥洗室。”

"All is good now. You have already graduated. You are a history graduate of our Khoy University~ Oh, you will soon be able to earn money. You should not be staying in the apartment you are currently living in. At the very least, you should have a bathroom you can call your own."
“真是神奇啊……”
"How magical......"
“神秘人”周明瑞同样目瞪口呆。
The 'mysterious person' Zhou Mingrui was similarly dumbfounded.
“福生玄黄上帝。”
"Blessings Stem From The Exalted Thearch of Heaven and Earth."
“福生玄黄仙尊。”
"Blessings Stem From The Immortal Lord of Heaven and Earth."
“福生玄黄天君。”
"Blessings Stem From The Sky Lord of Heaven and Earth."
“福生玄黄天尊。”
"Blessings Stem From The Celestial Worthy of Heaven and Earth."
“穿越带来的治疗效果？”周明瑞翘了下右边嘴角，无声低语。
"The restorative effects that transmigration beings?" Zhou Mingrui curled up the right corner of his mouth as he muttered silently.
“罗塞尔同志难道真是‘前辈’……不知道是不是我大吃货帝国的老乡……”周明瑞嘴角微动，一阵恍惚。
Could Roselle have been a 'predecessor'... I wonder if he was also a fellow countrymen of mine... Zhou Mingrui mumbled to himself subconsciously.
“虽然绝大多数人一生都见不到非凡，以至于怀疑教会也是同样的情况，甚至在几大教会内部，不少神职人员也有类似的想法，但我可以明确告诉你，在仲裁庭，在裁判所，在处刑机关，非凡者依旧存在，依旧在对抗着黑暗里生长的危险，只是数量和黑铁时代早期或之前相比，少了很多很多。”

"The majority of us would not meet an extraordinaire for the whole of our lives. This has caused churches, and even some clergies within some of the biggest churches, to suspect the same. While this is the case, I am certain to tell you that extraordinaires still exist in courts, tribunals and execution agencies. They are still fighting against the danger of growing in the dark, only that their numbers are much fewer as compared to that before and during the early days of the Iron Age.
“血手印？”周明瑞下意识翻开了刚才按住桌缘的右手，低头一瞧，只见掌心和手指满是血污。
"A bloody handprint?" Zhou Mingrui subconsciously flipped his right hand which was holding the ends of the table. Looking down, he saw that his palm and fingers were covered in blood.
“要占卜吗？”
"Would you like to try a divination?"
“解读不额外收费吧？”
"This reading does not require additional fees, right?"
“记得买新的面包，只要八磅，天气热，太多容易坏掉，还有羔羊肉和豌豆，记得！”
"Remember to buy fresh bread. All we need is eight pounds. The weather is hot, so the bread will easily spoil. Also, buy the mutton and peas. Remember to buy them!"
“过去，现在，和未来。”
"Past, present, and future."
“还差鬼鲨的血……”阿尔杰低语道。
"We're still short of the Ghost Shark's blood…" Alger murmured.
“还有几天。”周明瑞含糊回答。
"In a few more days," answered Zhou Mingrui vaguely.
"This…"
“这位先生，需要我帮你解读吗？”真正的占卜师看向周明瑞，微笑问道。
"Sir, would you like me to interpret your cards for you?" the real fortune-teller looked at Zhou Mingrui and asked with a smile.
“这就是月入三四千和月入一万四五的差别……”周明瑞暗自嘀咕了一句。
"This is the difference between earning three to four thousand yuan and earning fourteen to fifteen thousand yuan a month…" Zhou Mingrui mumbled to himself.
“这张象征未来。”
"This card symbolizes the future."
“这张象征现在。”占卜师将第二张牌放到周明瑞正前方。、
"This card symbolize your present." The fortune-teller placed the second card right in front of Zhou Mingrui.
“这是什么情况？”周明瑞愕然四望，继而低头，发现自己漂浮在一片无垠灰雾的边缘。
"What's with this situation?" Zhou Mingrui suddenly looked around him and then lowered his head down to discover that he was floating on the edge of an endless fog.
“这次没问题了吧？”他把切好的纸牌放置于桌上。
"There won't be any problems this time, right?" He placed the already cut deck back onto the table.
“这真是一次奇妙的体验……嗯，我一直期待着类似的事情，我是说，我喜欢神秘，喜欢超越自然的奇迹，不，我的重点，我的意思是，阁下，我该怎样做才能成为非凡者？”

"This is such a wonderful experience......Yes, I have always been anticipating the happening of such events. I'm saying, I like mysteries and supernatural miracles. Nope, my point is, what I mean is that, Your Honour, what can I do to become an extraordinaire?
“那算了。”周明瑞将手掌插回口袋，按住左轮和纸币，弯腰穿出了帐篷。
"Then forget it." Zhou Mingrui pulled his hands back and put them into his pockets. He clutched his revolver and money before stooping again to exit the tent.
“那请你再洗一次牌，明白自己想询问什么，才能洗出真正有象征意义的牌。”
"Then please reshuffle the deck. You can only truly get the cards you want if you know what you would like to ask about."
“钱还真不禁花啊，可怜的班森……”周明瑞不仅没了带出门的两张纸币，还搭上了原本裤袋里的一枚便士。

"There is really not enough to go around for spending. Poor Benson…" Not only had Zhou Mingrui spent the two notes that he had brought with him, but it was also necessary for him top it up with the one penny he had in his pocket.
“阁下，尝试结束了吗？可以让我们回去了吗？”
"Your Honour, is this attempt finished yet? Can you allow us to go back?"
“阁下，这是哪里？”
"Sir, where is this?"
“魔镜魔镜快苏醒……”
"Mirror, mirror, awaken...
“鲁恩王国的大学有毕业生不直接留校的传统……导师给了一份廷根大学，一份贝克兰德大学的推荐信……”

The university graduates of Loen Kingdom do not have the tradition of staying on at their alma mater… His counselor had given him a recommendation letter for Tingen University and Backlund University…
一丛火苗燃起，迅速变大，明亮的光线先是占据了壁灯内部，接着穿过透明的玻璃，将房间蒙上了温馨的色彩。
A fire plume ignited and rapidly grew. Bright light first occupied the internals of the wall lamp before penetrating the transparent glass, blanketing the room with a warm glow.
一个尝试……一个尝试？奥黛丽.霍尔望着那被灰白雾气笼罩的神秘男子，只觉事情荒唐、好笑、惊悚、奇诡。
An attempt...an attempt? Audrey Hall looked at the mysterious guy veiled in grayish-white fog, and the only thought was that this event was absurd, funny, horrifying and weird.
一个平民出生的历史系毕业生能惹上什么事情？
What kind of trouble could a history graduate of humble origins get himself into?
一个记忆的碎片应激而出，周明瑞转头看向了书桌紧挨着的那面墙壁上的灰白管道和金属栅格包围成的壁灯。
A memory fragment triggered as Zhou Mingrui turned his head to look at the grayish-white pipes and the metallic-gridded lamp on the wall right beside the study desk.
一人倒了两大杯，梅丽莎和周明瑞就着茶水，分享了两条黑麦面包。
Melissa poured two big cups of tea as she shared two black rye bread with Zhou Mingrui over tea.
一位表情麻木的妇女经过，裙摆肮脏，肌肤黯淡。
A deadpan woman passed by; her skirt was dirty and her skin was dull.
一片灰白的迷雾之上，奥黛丽.霍尔恢复了视线，又惊恐又迷茫地左右打量起来，看见斜对面头部模糊、身影朦胧的男子也是差不多的动作。

In the fog of gray mist, Audrey Hall regained her sight. She started reckoning the situation in a state of horror and confusion when she noticed the blurry image of a man on the opposite side of her doing the same as well.
一路前行，当周围人群密度恢复正常后，周明瑞重新挺直腰背，抬高脑袋，看向街头。
He proceeded forward until he reached a point where the crowdedness around him restored to normal. He straightened his back and raised his head to look down the street.
一道闪电划过周明瑞的脑海，照亮了他被迷雾所遮掩的记忆。
A thought flashed in Zhou Mingrui's mind, illuminating the memories which were concealed by a fog of confusion.
一阵又一阵的抽痛让周明瑞点滴积累起虚幻的力量，终于，他一鼓作气地挺动腰背睁开眼睛，彻底摆脱了半睡半醒的状态。
Throbbing pain inundated Zhou Mingrui, allowing him to slowly accumulate immaterial strength until he was finally able to move his back and open his eyes. He finally broke free from his reverie.
上上个月更是要15便士。
It cost 15 pence the month before the previous month.
下意识扭头望去，周明瑞看见一个低矮帐篷前站着位头戴尖帽、身穿黑色长裙的女人。
Zhou Mingrui subconsciously turned his head and saw a woman wearing a pointed hat and a long black dress standing in front of a short tent.
下意识间，他抬起脑袋，视线一点点上移：
Subconsciously, he looked up and shifted his gaze up bit by bit.
不仅仅氛围，周明瑞觉得自己的身体也同样的飘忽。
It was not only the mood; Zhou Mingrui felt his own body going through the same sensations as well.
